data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Haifa, Israel.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haifa, Israel
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Haifa, Israel.
Spirit, help every believer in Haifa, Israel be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Haifa, Israel.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Bukharic-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Haifa. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Haifa an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Haifa, Israel find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

location.name: Haifa
location.cities_list: Haifa, Zikhron Ya‘aqov, Tirat Karmel, El Fureidīs, Atlit
